TransactionStateContext.CallCheckedState: When the callchecked function is executed, requiring a checked call to callee.
TransactionStateContext.CallNotCheckedState: When the callnotchecked function is executed, allowing an unchecked call to callee.

ExternalCalls.Description: Executes a checked call to an external address (callee).
Executes an unchecked call to an external address (callee), potentially causing an unexpected failure.
